name: Yesterday (itch) (bbpw)
description: Yesterday is a rogue-lite, card game, tower-defence where you, as a robotic owner of a farm, need to defend it from waves of enemies. Different beasts and investors try to approach your property. As the player, you complete minigames and in turn will be rewarded with a card pack which you will add to your deck. After finishing the minigame / preparation phase, you will have to defend your farm in a tower-defence style card-game with the cards you collected thus far
